task.title: Filter by Event type
task.shortdesc: Users can narrow down what type of events appear in the timeline or the map by selecting from a list on the left side of the page.

step.cmd: Select the type of events you would like to view.

info.p: Events are categorized into five different types: bibliographical, biographical, literary, political, social, and mixed.

step.cmd: If you would like to view multiple event types, check multiple checkboxes.

info.p: The check box at the top of the “Event type” field tells the user how many of the filters have been checked.

step.cmd: View the events that belong in the selected event type categories in the timeline or the map.

info.p: Once the users checks one of these options, the timeline and map will automatically narrow down the results to events that belong in that category(ies).

step.cmd: To reset the event type filter, uncheck the top checkbox (or individually selected boxes) or select “Reset All Filters” option above the map.
